Question: This person worked as a butcher's assistant and a lineman in his teens and early twenties.
Hints: In 1934, this person married Dolores (DeFina) Reade, who had been one of his co-stars on Broadway in Roberta.
This person's first short-lived marriage was to his vaudeville partner, Grace Louise Troxell, whom he married in January 1933.
As an adult, this person donated sizable sums of money to the institution.
